jd: From: Dhiraj Kumar, SIRI INFO SOLUTIONS INC dhiraj@siriinfo.com Reply to: dhiraj@siriinfo.com Title: WPF Developer Duration: Long Term ContractLocation: Houston, TX – Day 1 Onsite Must Haves: enterprise line of business applications, .NET, C#, WPF, MVVM, SQL, Oracle, TFS, GIT Description: - 7+ years of enterprise software development experience, namely building and supporting enterprise line of business applications in mixed-platform environments- 5+ years of hands-on C# development experience, including experience with WPF and MVVM patterns- 5+ years of database development experience with one or more RDBMS technologies (MySQL, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server)- Strong experience in the design and development of large multi-tiered applications- Strong experience using the .NET Framework and a variety of open source and commercial component frameworks- Knowledge and experience of distributed computing technologies, caching and in-memory data processing, and concurrent programming- Strong knowledge and experience of software design patterns and enterprise integration patterns- Knowledge and experience with unit testing frameworks and best practices- Knowledge and experience with enterprise messaging patterns and technology- Knowledge and experience of automated build tools and integrated builds- Knowledge and experience with using TFS, Git, ADO in full software lifecycle- Knowledge and experience with usage of Git source code repository, Feature branch, Branch strategy Pull Requests, Gated Checkin, Pull Request Reviews, Conflict resolution, Pull Push to Git repo etc.- Knowledge and experience of energy trading, scheduling, valuation, risk management, and settlement systems Kind Regards, Dhiraj Kumar | Lead RecruiterSIRI INFO SOLUTIONS INCEmail id : dhiraj@siriinfo.com
